column1: Uchi////My husband and I have been here twice...and he ranks both of the meals in his top 5 meals ever eaten. The flavors are awesome
column3: and lots of variety. If you're famished this isn't the place to go
column4: its definitely quality and experience over quantity. Neither husband nor I are sushi/Japanese food connoisseurs
column5: but the waiters have been consistently helpful and knowledgeable
column6: in addition to being extremely pleasant. We will have to hit Uchi Austin soon
column7: since its closer to where we are now
column8: but if its anything like Uchi Houston
column9: I know it will be phenomenal.
